name: Wizard Legacy: Grand Tower
description:
Wizard Legacy: Grand Tower. Padamkan api yang membakar tower dan bunuh monster yang menyerang. Game Terinspirasi dari Fix it Felix & Wild Guns.

Controls:

WASD : Move up, down, left , right

Spacebar : Padamkan Api

Cursor : Aim 

Left Click Mouse : Shoot

Developed by:

Ouroboros Technologies : Andrew, Felix, Fachry

Credits:

Audio SFX = Jochi
